trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> method that is called when a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call completes.
trans-unit.target: Le istanze di questa classe vengono passate a un <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> metodo che viene chiamato quando un <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> completamento della chiamata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request asynchronously and wait for a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> metodi inviare in modo asincrono una richiesta echo Internet controllo Message Protocol (ICMP) e attendere il messaggio di risposta echo ICMP corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A> property contains the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A> proprietà contiene i risultati della richiesta echo ICMP.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates sending an ICMP echo request asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato l'invio in modo asincrono una richiesta echo ICMP.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains data that describes an attempt to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request message and receive a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto contenente dati che descrivono un tentativo di invio di un messaggio di richiesta echo ICMP (Internet Control Message Protocol) e di ricezione di un messaggio di risposta echo ICMP corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply" /> object that describes the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply" /> che descrive i risultati dell'Echo Request del protocollo ICMP.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.Success>, you should not use the values that are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore di <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> non <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.Success>, i valori restituiti da non utilizzare il <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, e <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties will return zero, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> e <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> proprietà restituirà zero e <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> restituirà `null`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example implements a method that is used to respond to a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.PingCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente implementa un metodo che viene utilizzato per rispondere a una <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.PingCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Per un esempio completo, vedere il <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> Cenni preliminari sulla classe.
